author: robbie
msg: QPID-3534: ignore transport exceptions raised whilst closing the network connection after sending the close-ok reply, as these can prevent failover occurring and are actually related to the broker (incorrectly) having already closed the socket
Applied patch from Oleksandr Rudyy<orudyy@gmail.com> and myself.
